name: Poop fast, run faster!
description:
Oh no! You need to poop just during the race of your life! Try to not s**t yourself.

You win the game if you poop enough in the toilet ;)

WASD/↑←↓→ - Movement

SPACE - Jump

P - Pause

Items
Poop meterBean-20Prune-40Cracker+50Football+5 (every touch)Child+80 (if saved)Runners-10 (every touch)
